title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 14 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 14 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: The fool hath said in his heart, There is no God. They are corrupt, they have done abominable works, there is none that doeth good.
lineList.cn: 愚顽人心里说，没有神。他们都是邪恶，行了可憎恶的事。没有一个人行善。

lineList.en: The LORD looked down from heaven upon the children of men, to see if there were any that did understand, and seek God.
lineList.cn: 耶和华从天上垂看世人，要看有明白的没有，有寻求神的没有。

lineList.en: They are all gone aside, they are all together become filthy: there is none that doeth good, no, not one.
lineList.cn: 他们都偏离正路，一同变为污秽。并没有行善的，连一个也没有。

lineList.en: Have all the workers of iniquity no knowledge? who eat up my people as they eat bread, and call not upon the LORD.
lineList.cn: 作孽的都没有知识吗。他们吞吃我的百姓，如同吃饭一样，并不求告耶和华。

lineList.en: There were they in great fear: for God is in the generation of the righteous.
lineList.cn: 他们在那里大大的害怕，因为神在义人的族类中。

lineList.en: Ye have shamed the counsel of the poor, because the LORD is his refuge.
lineList.cn: 你们叫困苦人的谋算，变为羞辱。然而耶和华是他的避难所。

lineList.en: Oh that the salvation of Israel were come out of Zion! when the LORD bringeth back the captivity of his people, Jacob shall rejoice, and Israel shall be glad.
lineList.cn: 但愿以色列的救恩从锡安而出。耶和华救回他被掳的子民，那时雅各要快乐，以色列要欢喜。
